Room.Name: Amberton Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Amberton Lane, west of the world famous elven shrine.
Room.LongDescription: The Holy Order of Corellon Larethian is located on the east side of the road. The powerful diety is the head of the entire religious pantheon for the elves of the land. Although there are many different and distinct races of elves, almost all of them worship Larethian.
